'''1.7.10 Build 2''' is the second build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on July 23, 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].

== Changes ==

=== General ===
* Some texts changed from "map" to "world" for consistency.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Assignment info not showing to students in the top left corner of the screen.
* Some edu blocks couldn't be opened if you were standing really close.
* Info blocks not showing text.
